subject: Alpine Skiing
Sports Injuries
Olympic Games
Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Ivica Kostelic, the overall World Cup leader, won the super-combined but sustained a knee injury, and Beat Feuz followed his downhill win with a second-place showing.
snippet: Ivica Kostelic, the overall World Cup leader, won the super-combined but sustained a knee injury, and Beat Feuz followed his downhill win with a second-place showing.
